Prerequisite(s): Three Mangled Gear Maneuvers
Range: melee or ranged attack
Target: see text
Duration: instantaneous

Description

As you strike an object, you overcharge it with energy so that it explodes an violently disrupts any nearby equipment. Make a sunder attempt against an object that does not provoke an attack of opportunity. If you succeed, the target takes an additional +[[10d6]] damage from the sunder attempt which ignores hardness. If you break the object you are trying to sunder, you may transfer any excess damage to other equipment the target possess or to the target themself as you choose. If you so wish, you may target a creature directly with this strike, in which case the strike still deals +[[10d6]] additional damage while ignoring damage reduction and hardness.
